update.title: MeeGo 1.2.0 oss Update
update.description: This update is recommended for all users running MeeGo 1.2.0. It includes general operating system fixes that enhance the stability, compatibility, and security of your devices, including fixes that: * xorg-x11-drv-intel Update: Fixed the issue that plug out VGA cable will cause Xorg restart when CPU loading is high * gthumb Update: Add the hotkeys preferences inside a scrollable area; Save the user preferences when the window is about to close * frozen-bubble Update: Add a run-time dependency on libmikmod * Package Manager Update: Fixed PackageKit hangs during some transactions issue * Pulseaudio Update: pulseaudio package updates for AEC * Chromium Update: Updated Chromium to 13.0.752.0 * Evolution mail client Update: Fixed evolution encryption methord language localization issue; Wraps long line in the Yahoo account setup; Add button to import vCalendar from Calendar View; Fixed Account editor window beyond screen border issue * Gtkhtml3 Update: remove the wrong htmltable.patch * eog Update: Disable collection button during slide show mode * package-groups Update: Add usb-modeswitch usb-modeswitch-data to meego-netbook-desktop.xml * installer Update: Fixed install freezing before installation completely; Fixed time zone cannot be selected issue * system-config-date Update: Fixed time zone cannot be selected issue * cheese Update: Fixed take photos automatically after disable/enable by FN+ESC issue; Fixed unable to take multiple photos issue. * kernel Update: Add linux-2.6.37-ml7213-eg20t-0007-fix-dma-issue-for-ch8-11.patch to make dma ch8~11 work to support I2S; Remove unnecessary debug information; Add include/xen tree to devel subpackage; Fixed several security issues; Fixed /dev/radio0 device not found issue * meego-ux-ivi Update: Fixed BMC#17184 - failed to launch task menu by "Tasks"; Fixed BMC#17438 - [IVI][VoiceCommand] failed to open apps directly; Fixed BMC#16941 - [IVI] no prompt give out when open deleted apps on desktop menu * libsocialweb Update: Fix crash when using feed and contacts; Twitter and flickr only support "feed" mode * gst-plugins-bad-free Update: Add vp8 plugin * Gnome-bluetooth Update: Fixed visibility should not be shown when bluetooth is off issue * libvpx Update: Add this new package which includes VP8 Video Codec * mx Update: MxGrid: compute min_width and min_height correctly (BMC #19206); Apply the paint opacity to both textures correctly in MxImage; Clarify the documentation for mx_bin_allocate_child; Indicate in the documentation which symbols are new in 1.2; Draw rectangles around actors when using the layout debug flag; MxBin: don't request space for the child when it is not visible; MxBin: hide the label when it is empty or no text has been set; Don't animate MxToggle if it is not mapped; Remove the hover state from MxToggle if the pointer left during a drag; idd a function to MxImage to animate changing the scale mode; Disable collection button during slide show mode. * banshee Update: Move the Internet Radio error message to the right place on the form * meego-netbook-theme Update: Make the GtkEntry PRELIGHT text state to be the same as the normal text color * Devices Panel Update: Use latest tarball 0.2.10; Update dependency on mx 1.1.12; Fixes: BMC#9645 - Little space for device buttons in some languages * Networks Panel Update: Also check the dragged widget when updating or removing items because of model updates

update.title: Package Manager Bug Fixes
update.description: * Please update this patch firstly, it is a must! Reboot after this update finished, and update other patches then. meego-try-again-while-downloading-fails.patch to fix BMC#21706

update.title: MeeGo 1.2.0 oss Update
update.description: This update is recommended for all users running MeeGo 1.2.0. It includes general operating system fixes that enhance the stability, compatibility, and security of your devices, including fixes that: * xorg-x11-drv-intel Update: Fixed the issue that plug out VGA cable will cause Xorg restart when CPU loading is high * gthumb Update: Add the hotkeys preferences inside a scrollable area; Save the user preferences when the window is about to close * frozen-bubble Update: Add a run-time dependency on libmikmod * Package Manager Update: Fixed PackageKit hangs during some transactions issue * Pulseaudio Update: pulseaudio package updates for AEC * Chromium Update: Updated Chromium to 13.0.752.0 * Evolution mail client Update: Fixed evolution encryption methord language localization issue; Wraps long line in the Yahoo account setup; Add button to import vCalendar from Calendar View; Fixed Account editor window beyond screen border issue * Gtkhtml3 Update: remove the wrong htmltable.patch * eog Update: Disable collection button during slide show mode * package-groups Update: Add usb-modeswitch usb-modeswitch-data to meego-netbook-desktop.xml * installer Update: Fixed install freezing before installation completely; Fixed time zone cannot be selected issue * system-config-date Update: Fixed time zone cannot be selected issue * cheese Update: Fixed take photos automatically after disable/enable by FN+ESC issue; Fixed unable to take multiple photos issue. * kernel Update: Add linux-2.6.37-ml7213-eg20t-0007-fix-dma-issue-for-ch8-11.patch to make dma ch8~11 work to support I2S; Remove unnecessary debug information; Add include/xen tree to devel subpackage; Fixed several security issues; Fixed /dev/radio0 device not found issue * meego-ux-ivi Update: Fixed BMC#17184 - failed to launch task menu by "Tasks"; Fixed BMC#17438 - [IVI][VoiceCommand] failed to open apps directly; Fixed BMC#16941 - [IVI] no prompt give out when open deleted apps on desktop menu * libsocialweb Update: Fix crash when using feed and contacts; Twitter and flickr only support "feed" mode * gst-plugins-bad-free Update: Add vp8 plugin * Gnome-bluetooth Update: Fixed visibility should not be shown when bluetooth is off issue * libvpx Update: Add this new package which includes VP8 Video Codec * mx Update: MxGrid: compute min_width and min_height correctly (BMC #19206); Apply the paint opacity to both textures correctly in MxImage; Clarify the documentation for mx_bin_allocate_child; Indicate in the documentation which symbols are new in 1.2; Draw rectangles around actors when using the layout debug flag; MxBin: don't request space for the child when it is not visible; MxBin: hide the label when it is empty or no text has been set; Don't animate MxToggle if it is not mapped; Remove the hover state from MxToggle if the pointer left during a drag; idd a function to MxImage to animate changing the scale mode; Disable collection button during slide show mode. * banshee Update: Move the Internet Radio error message to the right place on the form * meego-netbook-theme Update: Make the GtkEntry PRELIGHT text state to be the same as the normal text color * Devices Panel Update: Use latest tarball 0.2.10; Update dependency on mx 1.1.12; Fixes: BMC#9645 - Little space for device buttons in some languages * Networks Panel Update: Also check the dragged widget when updating or removing items because of model updates

update.title: MeeGo 1.2.0 oss Update
update.description: This update is recommended for all users running MeeGo 1.2.0. It includes general operating system fixes that enhance the stability, compatibility, and security of your devices, including fixes that: * xorg-x11-drv-intel Update: Fixed the issue that plug out VGA cable will cause Xorg restart when CPU loading is high * gthumb Update: Add the hotkeys preferences inside a scrollable area; Fixed time zone cannot be selected issue * system-config-date Update: Fixed time zone cannot be selected issue * cheese Update: Fixed take photos automatically after disable/enable by FN+ESC issue; Fixed unable to take multiple photos issue. * kernel Update: Add linux-2.6.37-ml7213-eg20t-0007-fix-dma-issue-for-ch8-11.patch to make dma ch8~11 work to support I2S; Remove unnecessary debug information; Add include/xen tree to devel subpackage; Fixed several security issues; Fixed /dev/radio0 device not found issue * meego-ux-ivi Update: Fixed BMC#17184 - failed to launch task menu by "Tasks"; Fixed BMC#17438 - [IVI][VoiceCommand] failed to open apps directly; Fixed BMC#16941 - [IVI] no prompt give out when open deleted apps on desktop menu * libsocialweb Update: Fix crash when using feed and contacts; Twitter and flickr only support "feed" mode * gst-plugins-bad-free Update: Add vp8 plugin * Gnome-bluetooth Update: Fixed visibility should not be shown when bluetooth is off issue * libvpx Update: Add this new package which includes VP8 Video Codec * mx Update: MxGrid: compute min_width and min_height correctly (BMC #19206); Apply the paint opacity to both textures correctly in MxImage; Clarify the documentation for mx_bin_allocate_child; Indicate in the documentation which symbols are new in 1.2; Draw rectangles around actors when using the layout debug flag; MxBin: don't request space for the child when it is not visible; MxBin: hide the label when it is empty or no text has been set; Don't animate MxToggle if it is not mapped; Remove the hover state from MxToggle if the pointer left during a drag; idd a function to MxImage to animate changing the scale mode; Disable collection button during slide show mode. * banshee Update: Move the Internet Radio error message to the right place on the form * meego-netbook-theme Update: Make the GtkEntry PRELIGHT text state to be the same as the normal text color * Devices Panel Update: Use latest tarball 0.2.10; Update dependency on mx 1.1.12; Fixes: BMC#9645 - Little space for device buttons in some languages * Networks Panel Update: Also check the dragged widget when updating or removing items because of model updates

update.description: * Please update this patch firstly, it is a must! Reboot after this update finished, and update other patches then. meego-try-again-while-downloading-fails.patch to fix BMC#21706

It includes general operating system fixes that enhance the stability, compatibility, and security of your devices, including fixes that: * xorg-x11-drv-intel Update: Fixed the issue that plug out VGA cable will cause Xorg restart when CPU loading is high * gthumb Update: Add the hotkeys preferences inside a scrollable area; Save the user preferences when the window is about to close * frozen-bubble Update: Add a run-time dependency on libmikmod * Package Manager Update: Fixed PackageKit hangs during some transactions issue * Pulseaudio Update: pulseaudio package updates for AEC * Chromium Update: Updated Chromium to 15.0.858.0 * Evolution mail client Update: Fixed evolution encryption methord language localization issue; Wraps long line in the Yahoo account setup; Add button to import vCalendar from Calendar View; Fixed Account editor window beyond screen border issue * Gtkhtml3 Update: remove the wrong htmltable.patch * eog Update: Disable collection button during slide show mode * package-groups Update: Add usb-modeswitch usb-modeswitch-data to meego-netbook-desktop.xml * installer Update: Fixed install freezing before installation completely; Fixed time zone cannot be selected issue * system-config-date Update: Fixed time zone cannot be selected issue * cheese Update: Fixed take photos automatically after disable/enable by FN+ESC issue; Fixed unable to take multiple photos issue. * kernel Update: Add linux-2.6.37-ml7213-eg20t-0007-fix-dma-issue-for-ch8-11.patch to make dma ch8~11 work to support I2S; Remove unnecessary debug information; Add include/xen tree to devel subpackage; Fixed several security issues; Fixed /dev/radio0 device not found issue * meego-ux-ivi Update: Fixed BMC#17184 - failed to launch task menu by "Tasks"; Fixed BMC#17438 - [IVI][VoiceCommand] failed to open apps directly; Fixed BMC#16941 - [IVI] no prompt give out when open deleted apps on desktop menu * libsocialweb Update: Fix crash when using feed and contacts; Twitter and flickr only support "feed" mode * gst-plugins-bad-free Update: Add vp8 plugin * Gnome-bluetooth Update: Fixed visibility should not be shown when bluetooth is off issue * libvpx Update: Add this new package which includes VP8 Video Codec * mx Update: MxGrid: compute min_width and min_height correctly (BMC #19206); Apply the paint opacity to both textures correctly in MxImage; Clarify the documentation for mx_bin_allocate_child; Indicate in the documentation which symbols are new in 1.2; Draw rectangles around actors when using the layout debug flag; MxBin: don't request space for the child when it is not visible; MxBin: hide the label when it is empty or no text has been set; Don't animate MxToggle if it is not mapped; Remove the hover state from MxToggle if the pointer left during a drag; idd a function to MxImage to animate changing the scale mode; Disable collection button during slide show mode. * banshee Update: Move the Internet Radio error message to the right place on the form * meego-netbook-theme Update: Make the GtkEntry PRELIGHT text state to be the same as the normal text color * Devices Panel Update: Use latest tarball 0.2.10; Update dependency on mx 1.1.12; Fixes: BMC#9645 - Little space for device buttons in some languages * Networks Panel Update: Also check the dragged widget when updating or removing items because of model updates

update.title: MeeGo 1.2.0 oss Update
update.description: This update is recommended for all users running MeeGo 1.2.0. It includes general operating system fixes that enhance the stability, compatibility, and security of your devices, including fixes that: * xorg-x11-drv-intel Update: Fixed the issue that plug out VGA cable will cause Xorg restart when CPU loading is high * gthumb Update: Add the hotkeys preferences inside a scrollable area; Save the user preferences when the window is about to close * frozen-bubble Update: Add a run-time dependency on libmikmod * Package Manager Update: Fixed PackageKit hangs during some transactions issue * Pulseaudio Update: pulseaudio package updates for AEC * Chromium Update: Updated Chromium to 15.0.858.0 * Evolution mail client Update: Fixed evolution encryption methord language localization issue; Wraps long line in the Yahoo account setup; Add button to import vCalendar from Calendar View; Fixed Account editor window beyond screen border issue * Gtkhtml3 Update: remove the wrong htmltable.patch * eog Update: Disable collection button during slide show mode * package-groups Update: Add usb-modeswitch usb-modeswitch-data to meego-netbook-desktop.xml * installer Update: Fixed install freezing before installation completely; Fixed time zone cannot be selected issue * system-config-date Update: Fixed time zone cannot be selected issue * cheese Update: Fixed take photos automatically after disable/enable by FN+ESC issue; Fixed unable to take multiple photos issue. * kernel Update: Add linux-2.6.37-ml7213-eg20t-0007-fix-dma-issue-for-ch8-11.patch to make dma ch8~11 work to support I2S; Remove unnecessary debug information; Add include/xen tree to devel subpackage; Fixed several security issues; Fixed /dev/radio0 device not found issue * meego-ux-ivi Update: Fixed BMC#17184 - failed to launch task menu by "Tasks"; Fixed BMC#17438 - [IVI][VoiceCommand] failed to open apps directly; Fixed BMC#16941 - [IVI] no prompt give out when open deleted apps on desktop menu * libsocialweb Update: Fix crash when using feed and contacts; Twitter and flickr only support "feed" mode * gst-plugins-bad-free Update: Add vp8 plugin * Gnome-bluetooth Update: Fixed visibility should not be shown when bluetooth is off issue * libvpx Update: Add this new package which includes VP8 Video Codec * mx Update: MxGrid: compute min_width and min_height correctly (BMC #19206); Apply the paint opacity to both textures correctly in MxImage; Clarify the documentation for mx_bin_allocate_child; Indicate in the documentation which symbols are new in 1.2; Draw rectangles around actors when using the layout debug flag; MxBin: don't request space for the child when it is not visible; MxBin: hide the label when it is empty or no text has been set; Don't animate MxToggle if it is not mapped; Remove the hover state from MxToggle if the pointer left during a drag; idd a function to MxImage to animate changing the scale mode; Disable collection button during slide show mode. * banshee Update: Move the Internet Radio error message to the right place on the form * meego-netbook-theme Update: Make the GtkEntry PRELIGHT text state to be the same as the normal text color * Devices Panel Update: Use latest tarball 0.2.10; Update dependency on mx 1.1.12; Fixes: BMC#9645 - Little space for device buttons in some languages * Networks Panel Update: Also check the dragged widget when updating or removing items because of model updates

update.title: Package Manager Bug Fixes
update.description: * Please update this patch firstly, it is a must! Reboot after this update finished, and update other patches then. meego-try-again-while-downloading-fails.patch to fix BMC#21706
